name: @realitypackagemanager/wasm-facet-engine
description: A piece of code designed to take a small set of json records and create facets based on sub parts of those records. This is for a small number of records as it is intended to be used as a webassembly on a client browser.

scripts.prepublish: make wasm && node node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js --presets=es2015 facet-engine.js > index.js
